title: 插件报错
author: qianzhenyi
txt_content:
[15:27:32] [Craft Scheduler Thread - 4/WARN]: 错误:无法打开该GUI界面
[15:27:32] [Craft Scheduler Thread - 4/WARN]: 原因:Attempted to send a plugin message that was too large. The maximum length a plugin message may be is 32766 bytes (tried to send one that is 34978 bytes long).
[15:27:32] [Craft Scheduler Thread - 4/WARN]: 以下是具体报错内容:
[15:27:32] [Craft Scheduler Thread - 4/WARN]: org.bukkit.plugin.messaging.MessageTooLargeException: Attempted to send a plugin message that was too large. The maximum length a plugin message may be is 32766 bytes (tried to send one that is 34978 bytes long).
[15:27:32] [Craft Scheduler Thread - 4/WARN]:         at org.bukkit.plugin.messaging.StandardMessenger.validatePluginMessage(StandardMessenger.java:485)
[15:27:32] [Craft Scheduler Thread - 4/WARN]:         at org.bukkit.craftbukkit.v1_12_R1.entity.CraftPlayer.sendPluginMessage(CraftPlayer.java:1078)
[15:27:32] [Craft Scheduler Thread - 4/WARN]:         at lk.vexview.api.VexViewAPI.openGui(fb:125)
[15:27:32] [Craft Scheduler Thread - 4/WARN]:         at me.wuxie.sv.svequipment.gui.ShowEquipmentGui$1.run(ShowEquipmentGui.java:81)
[15:27:32] [Craft Scheduler Thread - 4/WARN]:         at org.bukkit.craftbukkit.v1_12_R1.scheduler.CraftTask.run(CraftTask.java:71)
[15:27:32] [Craft Scheduler Thread - 4/WARN]:         at org.bukkit.craftbukkit.v1_12_R1.scheduler.CraftAsyncTask.run(CraftAsyncTask.java:52)
[15:27:32] [Craft Scheduler Thread - 4/WARN]:         at java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor.runWorker(Unknown Source)
[15:27:32] [Craft Scheduler Thread - 4/WARN]:         at java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor$Worker.run(Unknown Source)
[15:27:32] [Craft Scheduler Thread - 4/WARN]:         at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)

replies.author: eesy
replies.txt_content: 需要楼主具体插件信息，该插件数据传输太大，你的服务端在给你警告

replies.author: qianzhenyi
replies.txt_content:
eesy 发表于 2019-7-12 15:39
需要楼主具体插件信息，该插件数据传输太大，你的服务端在给你警告




Screenshot_2019-07-12-15-44-27-873_com.quark.browser.png (192.68 KB, 下载次数: 0)

下载附件

2019-7-12 15:44 上传




是这个插件，以前按y可以打开装备栏，现在装备放满无法打开了，有什么解决办法吗

replies.author: 阴阳师元素祭祀
replies.txt_content:
你制作的gui数据太大了 服务器发不了
可以尝试减少数据

replies.author: eesy
replies.txt_content:
qianzhenyi 发表于 2019-7-12 15:46
是这个插件，以前按y可以打开装备栏，现在装备放满无法打开了，有什么解决办法吗 ...
尝试在config文件内调试（看能不能限制数据大小）
